mapper.insert: insert into ec_import_dets (import_det_cd, import_cd, import_content, import_sts, import_reason, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{importDetCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_import_dets set import_cd = #{importCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, import_content = #{importContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, import_sts = #{importSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, import_reason = #{importReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where import_det_cd = #{importDetCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select import_det_cd, import_cd, import_content, import_sts, import_reason, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_import_dets where import_det_cd = #{importDetCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
